TopicTitle: Fuel Tank Info Missing from Part Manager

Articles.Content:
System Info

KSP Version: KSP2 Build ID 10624168

Operating System and version: Windows 11 / Version 22H2

CPU and GPU models: AMD 5800X / NVIDIA RTX 3700 / 32GB RAM

Mods Installed: None

Description of the Bug

Expected Behavior: Fuel tank part should expose information on the amount of fuel contained

Observed Behavior: No information is available when the fuel info is expanded for monoprop, liquid, or methalox (other types could also have this issue)

Steps to Replicate: Right click a fuel tank in flight

Fixes / Workarounds: N/A

Screenshot: https://imgur.com/a/xJRMKPV
